activities:
Knowledge Factor (KF) is a SaaS company who provides an e-learning platform (amplifire). Clients enter their training content into amplifire and the Client’s employees, students or customers (Learners) login to take tests and/or learn. KF typically collects a Learner’s email address and name for identification and possible support reasons. SS#’s, bank information, address and other pii are not collected by KF. Test results are the property of Client except that KF has the right to use results in aggregate for R&D and marketing purposes.
The marketing site offers publicly accessible blogs or community forums. Information provided in these areas may be read, collected and used by others. KF also posts Client/Learner testimonials, comments and reviews on this site which may contain pii, however, consent to use their name is obtained via email prior to posting.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client, customer on-line or off-line data - no manually processed data
